Name: MMA Championship
About the game: MMA Championship is a mixed martial arts fighting game that allows you to throw different types of strikes from standing and from ground position to beat up your opponent. you can either play against the computer in single player mode work your way through 6 opponents to become a MMA champion or challenge a friend in 2 player local Key features: . Free Content Updates . Online Multiplayer . Character Select . PVP Mode Note . a controller is required for local multiplayer
Meta Title: MMA Championship: Dec 20, 2021, Karl Brown and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on MMA Championship? Check out the release date (Dec 20, 2021), developer insights from Karl Brown, and a complete game summary.
